The ship was impaled on a sharp underwater volcano. Its main bay
window had=
 been smashed ages ago when the fighters had left the place
in a hurry as t=
he warship was crashing into the sea.

A volcanic eruption shook the area. =
The energon deposits encrusted
along its rim exploded and boiled away, but =
not before a low magnitude
surge hit the ship. It was just enough.

The lon=
e warrior, twice a hero, had been in stasis lock since the
crash.  By now, =
he was covered in seaweeds and deep sea animals, then
the surge shook him b=
ack to life. Pressure should have crushed him to
ruins, but his was a trans=
metal 2 body, and not so easily vanquished
by nature.

He rose painfully, c=
onfused, and after computing where he was, started
walking back to the shor=
e.

Dinobot 2 was back.
